story.title: Our story
paragraphs: FitMyCV was born from a frustration many know too well: spending hours adapting your resume for each job application. Rephrasing, reorganizing, hoping this time it will pass the recruiter filters...
We thought there had to be a better way. What if AI could help us create resumes truly tailored to each job offer?

mission.title: Our mission
paragraphs: To save you time and give you the best chances of landing that interview. No generic resume sent en masse, but a tailored CV for each opportunity.
Because every job offer is unique, your resume should be too.

features.title: What FitMyCV can do for you

items.title: Smart generation
items.description: AI analyzes the job offer and adapts your resume to highlight the skills being sought.

items.title: Match score
items.description: Instantly know if your profile matches the job with a detailed compatibility score.

items.title: Multi-language
items.description: Translate your resume in one click. French, English, Spanish, German... your choice.

items.title: ATS optimized
items.description: Pass through automated recruiter filters with properly formatted content.

items.title: Multiple analysis levels
items.description: From quick to in-depth, choose the analysis level that suits your needs.

steps.title: Import your resume
steps.description: Upload your existing resume as PDF or create a new one directly on the platform.

steps.title: Paste the job offer
steps.description: Copy-paste the text of the job that interests you. AI will analyze it in detail.

steps.title: Generate your optimized resume
steps.description: In seconds, get a resume tailored to the job, ready to download and send.

content.text: Your personal data is never sold. It may only be shared with:

items: Service providers: hosting (cloud infrastructure), authentication (NextAuth, OAuth providers), AI (OpenAI for CV generation)
Legal authorities: if required by law or to protect our rights

content.title: Important:
content.text: Your CV data is sent to OpenAI (GPT model) for generation and adaptation. OpenAI states that it does not use API data to train its models.
We implement the following security measures:

items: Encryption: AES-256-GCM for all stored CVs
HTTPS: secure communication (SSL/TLS)
Password hashing: bcrypt with salt
CSRF protection: anti-forgery tokens
Secure cookies: HttpOnly, Secure, SameSite
Secure authentication: JWT, session tokens
Anti-spam protection: Google reCAPTCHA v3 to prevent abuse

content.title: reCAPTCHA Protection:
content.text: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and Google's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
